forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 49F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low around 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
